name: Soy candles- choose your own scent-16 oz Jar
description:
Hand-poured when you order, a large 16 oz soy candle in an apothecary jar with flat glass lid. 

All of the scents I carry have been tested so that I can ensure that they are strong from the first burn to the last.There are many benefits to burning soy wax. It is considered a "cleaner" burning wax and when burned properly it is virtually soot free. It also benefits farmers here in the USA!


--------------------------------------------------

Choose from the following fall and holiday scents:

Pumpkin souffle-pumpkin, butter, sugar and spice.

Amish Harvest-cinnamon, spice and dried fruits

Cinnamon Balsam-cinnamon with a touch of balsam fir.

Hansel and Gretel-vanilla, graham cracker, cinnamon, raisin

Frankinscence and Myrrh- frankincense, myrrh, patchouli, sandalwood, balsam and spice.

Cranberry Marmalade-tart cranberries, spiced apples and orange peel.

Creme Brulee-vanilla custard with carmalized sugar.

Home for the Holidays-spruce, lightly sweetened bakery notes, cinnamon spice, and candied fruits.
